languages.text: {n}Ульфар делает покровительственный жест.{/n} "Недурно, смотритель над казной. По тебе не скажешь, что в сердце твоем есть вкус к кровопролитию. Я одобряю твое рвение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ульфар делает покровительственный жест.{/n} "Недурно, смотритель над казной. По тебе не скажешь, что в сердце твоем есть вкус к кровопролитию. Я одобряю твое рвение".

languages.text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар делает покровительственный жест.{/n} "Недурно, смотритель над казной. По тебе не скажешь, что в сердце твоем есть вкус к кровопролитию. Я одобряю твое рвение".

{n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar hace un gesto condescendiente.{/n} «No está mal, guardián del cofre. Quién hubiese pensado que tu corazón albergaba tanto gusto por el derramamiento de sangre. Admiro tu vigor».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar hace un gesto condescendiente.{/n} «No está mal, guardián del cofre. Quién hubiese pensado que tu corazón albergaba tanto gusto por el derramamiento de sangre. Admiro tu vigor».

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは恩着せがましい仕草をする。{/n}「悪くない、金庫番。これほどの血生臭いものを好むとは思わなかったぞ。その活力を認めよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは恩着せがましい仕草をする。{/n}「悪くない、金庫番。これほどの血生臭いものを好むとは思わなかったぞ。その活力を認めよう」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法做了个居高临下的手势。{/n}“不赖嘛，金库的保管员。没想到你心里也怀着对鲜血的渴望，我赞赏你的气势。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法做了个居高临下的手势。{/n}“不赖嘛，金库的保管员。没想到你心里也怀着对鲜血的渴望，我赞赏你的气势。”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar macht eine herablassende Geste.{/n} "Nicht schlecht, Kassenhüter. Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass Ihr Spaß am Blutvergießen findet. Euer Elan gefällt mir."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar macht eine herablassende Geste.{/n} "Nicht schlecht, Kassenhüter. Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass Ihr Spaß am Blutvergießen findet. Euer Elan gefällt mir."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar esquisse un geste condescendant.{/n} « Pas mal, pour un bureaucrate. Je n'aurais jamais cru que votre cœur était animé d'une telle soif de sang. Votre combativité vous honore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar esquisse un geste condescendant.{/n} « Pas mal, pour un bureaucrate. Je n'aurais jamais cru que votre cœur était animé d'une telle soif de sang. Votre combativité vous honore. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, üstünlük taslayan bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Fena değil hazinedar. Yüreğinde böylesine kana susamışlık olduğu aklımdan geçmemişti. Dinçliğini tasvip ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a patronising gesture.{/n} "Not bad, coffer keeper. I wouldn't have thought there was such a taste for bloodshed in your heart. I approve of your vigour."
